com.ibm.xasdi_bridge.simulator

Interface Driver


  • public interface Driver

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void begin()
      Called when all drivers are finished to prepare.
      void begin(long time)
      Called at the beginning of a simulation cycle for the specified simulation time.
      void complete()
      Called when the simulation is completed.
      void complete(long time)
      Called when the simulation cycle for the specified simulation time is completed.
      void execute(long time)
      Called when this object run and make agents run.
      void execute(long time, int phase)
      Called when this object run and make agents run.
      long getID()
      Get ID of this Driver agent.
      void onMessage(MessageList ml)
      Called when some messages received.
      void prepare()
      Called when parameters are set to this object.
      void setRegion(Region region)
      Bind this object to Region.

    • Method Detail

      • begin

        void begin()
        Called when all drivers are finished to prepare. This method will be called only once just before the simulation loop begins.
        See Also:
        prepare()

      • complete

        void complete()
        Called when the simulation is completed.

      • begin

        void begin(long time)
        Called at the beginning of a simulation cycle for the specified simulation time. execute(long, int) will be called for each simulation phases
        Parameters:
        time - a simulation cycle (time)

      • complete

        void complete(long time)
        Called when the simulation cycle for the specified simulation time is completed.
        Parameters:
        time - a simulation time

      • execute

        void execute(long time,
           int phase)
        Called when this object run and make agents run.
        Parameters:
        time - Simulation step
        phase - Simulation phase at each step

      • execute

        void execute(long time)
        Called when this object run and make agents run.
        Parameters:
        time - Simulation step

      • getID

        long getID()
        Get ID of this Driver agent.
        Returns:
        ID of this agent

      • prepare

        void prepare()
        Called when parameters are set to this object.

      • setRegion

        void setRegion(Region region)
        Bind this object to Region.
        Parameters:
        region - Region possesses this Driver agent

      • onMessage

        void onMessage(MessageList ml)
        Called when some messages received.
        Parameters:
        ml - List of messages to be received
